tool_description: An API that provides information about credit card sign-up bonuses, spend categories, redemption categories, rewards, benefits, card images and more!
name: Rewards Credit Card API
title: Rewards Credit Card API

api_list.name: Search Card by Name
api_list.description: Search credit card names by string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-detail-namesearch/ihg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-detail-namesearch/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Plaid Spending by Card
api_list.description: This endpoint returns Plaid spending categories for a single credit card

api_list.name: Detail By Card
api_list.description: This endpoint returns detailed information for a single credit card

api_list.name: Transfer Program List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all travel programs that points can be transfered to from a bank points program (e.g American Express Membership Rewards)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-pointtransfer-transferprogramlist/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Credit Card Google Maps Spend
api_list.description: This returns the spend rate for a card based on the Google Maps business name or category name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-spend-googlemaps/amex-hilton/Town & Country Market Shoreline/Grocery store"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
